strings.string: Choose Shortcut function for Music Icon : Albums Artists Genres Songs
Enable/Disable Always Colored Icons on Home Screen, when Disabled Icons will only become colored when Focused
Choose Addon for Subtitles Search & Download
Choose Addon for Lyrics Search & Download
Enable or Disable Clock On top right of All Pages (not while watching Movies).[CR]Home Menu Will show Time and date.
Enable or Disable Vinyl Record Animation from Home Shelf Albums.
Specify Action for Power Icon in Menu
Fanart image[CR][CR]Unavailable[CR][CR] Click button to set

A great way to install Add-Ons is using[CR] FUSION INSTALLER.[CR] In Order to do so: Press YES PLEASE at the bottom of this dialog and Follow onscreen instructions![CR][CR] Brought to You by:[CR] www.XBMCHUB.com
If You want help with FUSION INSTALLER Just Click On this setting and go to Add-ons Manager. A PopUp will appear asking you if you want further help.. just say yes!
Replace SiO2 Icon on Shelf with A Picture of Your choice.
Click to Add Favourite to Home Page
Click to Pick Icon, Change Favourite or Remove Favourite
Reset ALL skin settings to default
Customize What Is Displayed On Home Shelf.
Enable Views Menu in order to change the way Items are presented to you.
Lock Access to Skin Specific Settings from Home Page
